Text: Hey Danny :) Sorry. I just got offline due to some work. But anyways I really thank you so very much for this stuff. N of course John Mclaughlin is one of my favorite guitarists :) Waiting for that as well :) Thanks a million for this DVD and also for taking your time to reply to my msgs. V much appreciated. Wish I could have met you personally. Would have given you a big treat :) Thanks again buddy :)
Do upload more rhythm guitar tutorials whenever u get them :):)

seems like I'm over-appreciated :)
anyway you are welcome.
:) Me just waiting for John Mclaughlin's Gateway to rhythm :)

to balaguitar

I'll upload it today, after midnight.
Un peu de patience, mon cher.
